instruction: A new restaurant has opened up in town. Come up with six menu items that the restaurant could serve.
output:
1. Grilled Vegetable Medley
2. Frittata with Fresh Herbs
3. Spicy Buffalo Wings
4. Grilled Steak with Garlic Mushroom Sauce
5. Slow-Roasted Salmon with Lemon-Dill Aioli
6. Baked Mac & Cheese with Crispy Bacon Topping
